thread.title: BRIEF-Ateme H1 net loss group share widens to 2.5 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Ateme H1 net loss group share widens to 2.5 million euros

title: BRIEF-Ateme H1 net loss group share widens to 2.5 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Ateme H1 net loss group share widens to 2.5 million euros Sept 30 
Sept 30 Ateme SA : 
* H1 net loss group share 2.5 million euros ($2.8 million) versus loss of 0.9 million euros year ago 
* H1 operating loss 3.0 million euros versus loss of 0.7 million euros year ago 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8947 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
